title: Romantic retreat
text:
THE NATION August 26, 2015 1:00 am 
Panviman Chiang Mai Spa Resort Panviman Chiang Mai Spa Resort is nestled high up in the hills, surrounded by tropical forests ... CHIANG MAI Romantic retreat Panviman Chiang Mai Spa Resort is nestled high up in the hills, surrounded by tropical forests, flower gardens and orchards in Mae Rim, a small district northwest of Chiang Mai . The resort is now offering a Honeymoon Package until October 31 that includes two nights' accommodation, daily breakfast, welcome drink upon arrival, Honeymoon room decoration, one candle-lit dinner in the Panorama Restaurant with a bottle of sparkling wine, spa treatment, roundtrip transfer by private van (from/to Chiang Mai Airport) and free Wi-Fi. The Mountain Deluxe is priced at Bt22,100, High Mountain Deluxe at Bt23,700, Jacuzzi Villa at Bt28,700 and Viman Pool Villa at Bt33,700. Call (053) 879 540-50 or e-mail: rsvn_chiangmai@panviman.com. BURIRAM A rich heritage Explore Buriram's Phanom Rung Temple with an amazing package from the Amari Buriram United, which includes transport, complimentary snack box, late check-out and many great extras. The Phanom Rung Package starts at Bt6,237 and is available from now until December 20. It includes a two-night stay in a Deluxe room, welcome drinks, daily breakfast for two, welcome fruit platter, 20 per-cent discount on food and beverage, roundtrip transfer to Phanom Rung Heritage Park and snacks. Book online at www.amari.com/buriram-united. PATTAYA Relax in style The Royal Cliff Grand Hotel showcases its new facilities with the Grand Relaxury Package. Discover an amazing retreat as you indulge and relax in lavish comfort inside newly refurbished suites revamped with a more contemporary design and featuring a wealth of amenities. The package includes accommodation with international buffet breakfast for two persons, fruit basket upon arrival, 15 per-cent discount at the Cliff Spa and 10 per-cent discount on food and beverage at the 11 restaurants throughout the resort. Rates per night range from Bt5,000 to Bt5,445 and the deal is valid through the end of September. Call (038) 250 421 extension 2732 or e-mail: reservations@royalcliff.com. Book online at www.RoyalCliff.com. BANGKOK AND BEYOND Room with a U The U chain of luxury boutique hotels and resorts is all ready to welcomes visitors to Booth P148 in the Queen Sirikit National Convention City's Plenary Hall from September 3 to 6 as it takes part in the 36th "Discovery Thailand" travel fair. Several U properties countrywide are taking part in the event, with room promotions ranging from Bt2,299 to Bt3,499 E-mail: salesth@uhotelsresorts.com or reserve@uhotelsresorts.com. Visit www.UHotelsResorts.com. KOH SAMUI Tropical treat Mantra Samui Resort, located just 20 minutes by car from Samui International Airport is now offering 30 per-cent discount on all room types for anyone staying two nights or more. The hotel features 5-star accommodation, an outdoor pool, a sauna and a free shuttle service. The offer is available from now until December 21. Call (077) 951 600 or e-mail: enquiries@mantrasamui.com. Island in the sun Hansar Koh Samui is situated on the tropical stretch of golden sands and turquoise waters of Koh Samui 's upmarket Bophut Bay and offers a front seat to island life. A full-board package for two nights starts from Bt21,000 and covers accommodation in a Sea View room, daily breakfast, daily set lunch and dinner at H-Bistro, complimentary Wi-Fi, private roundtrip airport transfer, Hansar signature cocktail upon arrival, welcome fruit basket, nightly turn down treat and early check-in/late check-out subject to availability. Call (077) 245 511 or e-mail: samney@hansarsamui.com. 227 Viewed
